articles.title: Long COVID: Could mono virus or fat cells be playing roles? - CTV News
articles.description: Plagued by eerily similar symptoms, a British historian, an Italian archeologist, and an American preschool teacher are credited with describing, naming and helping bring long COVID into the public's consciousness in early 2020.
articles.content:
A British historian, an Italian archeologist and an American preschool teacher have never met in person, but they share a prominent pandemic bond.

articles.author: Hope Yen
articles.title: EXPLAINER: 2023 tax credits for EVs will boost their appeal - The Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Starting Jan. 1, many Americans will qualify for a tax credit of up to $7,500 for buying an electric vehicle. The credit, part of changes enacted in the Inflation Reduction Act,  is designed to spur EV sales and reduce greenhouse emissions .

articles.title: Mall of America shooting victim identified as 19-year-old St. Paul resident - Fox News
articles.description: Minnesota man Johntae Hudson was identified on Sunday evening as the 19-year-old who was shot and killed at the Mall of America on Dec. 23.
articles.content:
The 19-year-old man who was shot and killed at the Mall of America on Friday evening was identified on Sunday as Johntae Hudson of St. Paul, according to Fox 9 Minneapolis.
